mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_ATTACH ( UUID, UPLOADPATH, FILENAME, IMAGE, BOARDNO ) VALUES ( #{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{image}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NO), 0) FROM RECALL_BOARD) )
mapper.select: SELECT UUID AS uuid, UPLOADPATH AS uploadPath, FILENAME AS fileName, IMAGE AS image, BOARDNO AS boardNo FROM BOARD_ATTACH WHERE BOARDNO = #{boardNo}
